title: ‘Old enmity’ claims two lives in Sibi - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
DERA MURAD JAMALI: Unidentified gunmen shot dead two people in Sibi town on Thursday.

Police said Aftab Ahmed and Abdul Sattar were going home when the gunmen opened fire, killing both on the spot. The attackers fled from the area after the shooting.

Police shifted the bodies to the hospital and later handed them over to their families.

The cause of the killing was stated to be an old enmity.

A case has been registered and efforts are underway to arrest the attackers.

Published in Dawn, April 4th, 2025
